GLSTENCILMASK(3G) GLSTENCILMASK(3G)

NAME

glStencilMask - control the writing of individual bits in the stencil planes

C SPECIFICATION

void glStencilMask( GLuint mask ) 








PARAMETERS



  
mask

  
Specifies a bit mask to enable and disable writing of individual bits in
      the stencil planes. Initially, the mask is all 1's.








DESCRIPTION

glStencilMask controls the writing of individual bits in the stencil
  planes. The least significant n bits of mask, where n is the number of
  bits in the stencil buffer, specify a mask. Where a 1 appears in the mask,
  it's possible to write to the corresponding bit in the stencil buffer. Where a
  0 appears, the corresponding bit is write-protected. Initially, all bits are
  enabled for writing.





ERRORS

GL_INVALID_OPERATION is generated if glStencilMask is executed
  between the execution of glBegin and the corresponding execution of
  glEnd.





ASSOCIATED
  GETS

glGet with argument GL_STENCIL_WRITEMASK


glGet with argument GL_STENCIL_BITS





SEE
  ALSO

glColorMask, glDepthMask, glIndexMask,
  glStencilFunc, glStencilOp
